div.codeblock: <rSelfDescription>Djuna Barnes wrote bitterly about Nightwood's literary reputation: "there is not a person in the literary world who has not heard of, read, and stolen some from Nightwood, not more than three or four have mentioned my name."</> <rSelfDescription>Janet Little called herself "a crazy scribbling lass."</> <rSelfDescription>Mary Scott feared that her muse would be deemed a heretic one.</>
